title: WikiYou.org
description: A site powered by sitegen as a community driven static site for anything you can think of.

title: P2P File Sharing
description: A peer to peer file sharing web app that is a wikiyou page. Allows you to share any files directly to anybody you share your share url with.

title: Sitegen Static Site Generator
description: Simple but flexible static site generator. Create static sites to host on github pages, netlify, firebase or any file hosting sites.

title: AppLauncher
description: App Launcher Plus is an App Drawer that automatically organize your apps base on google play categories. It is not a full featured launcher, so it will not replace your current launcher. But you can use it as an alternative app drawer.

title: AppCaller
description: App Caller is an android application that helps you get an immediate response from other users to launch an app, share links and photos.

title: Chip'n Ship
description: Crowdfunding platform for online shopping and group gifting. It targets users who wants to buy something online by sharing expenses.

Unlike other crowdgifting/donation platforms, this eliminates the need for a middle person in purchasing the items when a wish has been granted. The platform automatically places the order and the items gets delivered.

title: HeardIt.org
description: HeardIt.org is an online community like reddit.

title: flickrsmartsync
description: flickrsmartsync is a tool you can use to easily sync up or down your photos in a drive/folder to flickr since now it has a free 1TB storage you can probably sync all your photo collection.

title: Highlight Reading
description: Easily read news and articles by highlighting your progress.

title: BuyFKC
description: This is a informational website about natural health products and food supplements.

title: Live Battery
description: Live Battery is a live wallpaper that shows your battery status bar on the corner of your wallpaper. It also warns you if your battery is below the warning specified on the config.

title: Null Doc
description: Null Doc is a website of collections of programming terms.
Random App shows random application from Google Play Store.
Open from URL is a Google Play app that lets you choose to get any files from internet with a link.
